channel.title: If i have a virus on my comp?
channel.description: will it get into my files that I offer people to download? just wondering.

item.title: If i have a virus on my comp?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“Mary|Jane, post:11, topic:199059”]You can’t get “bugged,” you download it, and scan it before you extract it.

So then if it is a virus, it wouldn’t effect you because it’s stip in .ZIP.[/quote]Well I know that, but… whatever. lol

Read full topic
item.source: If i have a virus on my comp?

item.title: If i have a virus on my comp?
item.dc:creator: @Mary_Jane Mary|Jane
item.description:
@Mary_Jane wrote:

You can’t get “bugged,” you download it, and scan it before you extract it.

So then if it is a virus, it wouldn’t effect you because it’s stip in .ZIP.

item.title: If i have a virus on my comp?

item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“Greeley Estates™, post:1, topic:199059”]will it get into my files that I offer people to download?
just wondering.[/quote]Mmhmm. So you’re screwed if it’s a bad virus that resists deletion… But on the bright side you can send e-mails with attachments from that computer if they got on your bad side. =]
